# stat311tutorials

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of stat311tutorials is to give students more practice with the material covered in lecture. 

## Installation

You can install the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("grover4/stat311tutorials")
```
To run the tutorials, navigate to the **Tutorial** pane of Rstudio and click *Start Tutorial*
